long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Groups Storage

Easily manage and organize your browser tabs into groups with Tab Groups Storage. Save, restore, and manage your tab groups effortlessly. Save several tabs to a group to be opened later! Save space, memory, and stay organized!

Features:

Save Tabs to Groups: Save your current tabs into named groups for easy access later.
Restore Tabs from Groups: Quickly restore all tabs from a saved group with a single click.
Add Tabs to Existing Groups: Add new tabs to your existing groups without hassle.
Remove Tabs from Groups: Remove specific tabs from your groups without reopening them.
Delete Groups: Delete entire groups when they are no longer needed.
Store Groups: Temporarily store groups to free up your tab bar.
Restore Single Tab: Restore a single tab from a group without restoring the entire group.
Store Single Tab:

Tab Groups can be stored across several windows, and even save when all windows are closed!
Change button color in settings :).

Future Developments:
 Hotkeys and right-click functionalities are still under development and may not work as expected. Stay tuned for updates!
